ci_support_linux_64_r_base4.4.yaml:
cdt_name:
- conda
channel_sources:
- conda-forge
channel_targets:
- conda-forge main
cran_mirror:
- https://cran.r-project.org
docker_image:
- quay.io/condaforge/linux-anvil-x86_64:alma9
pin_run_as_build:
  r-base:
    min_pin: x.x
    max_pin: x.x
r_base:
- '4.4'
target_platform:
- linux-64

about.summary: This package provides infrastructure to access OpenStreetMap data from different sources, to work with the data in common R manner, and to convert data into available infrastructure provided by existing R packages (e.g., into sp and igraph objects).

This package provides infrastructure to access OpenStreetMap data from different sources, to work with the data in common R manner, and to convert data into available infrastructure provided by existing R packages (e.g., into sp and igraph objects).

name: r-osmar
raw_meta_yaml:
{% set version = '1.1-7' %}
{% set posix = 'm2-' if win else '' %}

package:
  name: r-osmar
  version: {{ version|replace("-", "_") }}

source:
  fn: osmar_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  url:
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/osmar_{{ version }}.tar.gz
    - {{ cran_mirror }}/src/contrib/Archive/osmar/osmar_{{ version }}.tar.gz
  sha256: 79c4c149a44c4220ca02e97f9675e2bf90de04124c5663ba5d009576b845cd60

build:
  noarch: generic
  number: 1007
  rpaths:
    - lib/R/lib/
    - lib/

requirements:
  build:
    - {{ posix }}zip               # [win]
  host:
    - r-base
    - r-rcurl
    - r-xml
    - r-geosphere
  run:
    - r-base
    - r-rcurl
    - r-xml
    - r-geosphere

test:
  commands:
    - $R -e "library('osmar')"           # [not win]
    - "\"%R%\" -e \"library('osmar')\""  # [win]

about:
  home: http://osmar.r-forge.r-project.org/
  license: GPL-2
  summary: This package provides infrastructure to access OpenStreetMap data from different sources,
    to work with the data in common R manner, and to convert data into available infrastructure
    provided by existing R packages (e.g., into sp and igraph objects).
  license_family: GPL2
  license_file: '{{ environ["PREFIX"] }}/lib/R/share/licenses/GPL-2'

extra:
  recipe-maintainers:
    - conda-forge/r
    - ocefpaf
